utils

Class PasswordAuthentication

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.PasswordAuthentication

  • public final class PasswordAuthentication
extends java.lang.Object
    Hash passwords for storage, and test passwords against password tokens. Instances of this class can be used concurrently by multiple threads.

        Create a password manager with a specified cost
        Parameters:

        Hash a password for storage.
        Returns:
        a secure authentication token to be stored for later authentication

      • hash

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String hash(java.lang.String password)
        Deprecated. Use hash(char[]) instead
        Hash a password in an immutable String.

        Passwords should be stored in a char[] so that it can be filled with zeros after use instead of lingering on the heap and elsewhere.

      • authenticate

        @Deprecated
public boolean authenticate(java.lang.String password,
                                         java.lang.String token)
        Deprecated. Use authenticate(char[],String) instead.
        Authenticate with a password in an immutable String and a stored password token.
        See Also:
        hash(String)
